alert.note: Alert for Oldham (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:53AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT OLDHAM COUNTY THROUGH 215 AM EDT... At 151 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of gusty winds ahead of strong thunderstorms along a line from 10 miles northwest of La Grange to near Prospect. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Prospect, Crestwood, Orchard Grass Hills, Pewee Valley, Goshen, River Bluff, Greenhaven, Demplytown, and Buckner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building.
